resources.string: Exception \"%1$s\" (caused by \"%2$s\") has been successfully caught!\n

string-array.name: msgMem
string-array.item: All your base are belong to us
I\'m sorry Dave, I\'m afraid I can\'t do that
Technically I was never alive, but I appreciate your concern

resources.string: Press \"Report It!\" to see the stuff
Something went wrong, please try again!
Congratulations! You are already member of the following groups and can start sharing rides immediately!
Let\'s start!! Invite your friends to join your ride sharing groups
Enter address or select on map >
What are groups and why do I need them?
Why canâ€™t I search for rides like other apps?
What will it cost and how do I pay?
(Number in brackets is members including the person who created the group)
We have sent One Time Password (OTP) to your Mobile
Link a wallet to pay for rides quickly. \r\n\r\nYou do not have a Mobikwik wallet registered with your number. Click on \'Send OTP\' to create a wallet
Link a wallet to pay for rides quickly. \r\n\r\nYou already have a Mobikwik wallet registered with your number. Click on \'Send OTP\' to link it now

User agrees to allow iShareRyde to transfer amount to/from user\'s Mobikwik wallet to settle fare splits at the end of each journey undertaken by the user. These transfers will be undertaken only after confirmation of fare split by both sending and receiving user. Further upon completion of journey and subsequent payment done, the User will not claim any other charges whatsoever from iShareRyde or its partners
By clicking on the button I agree to the terms & conditions mentioned at the link below

1. Extra cash Amount is fixed at Rs. 50/- for a Minimum "Add Money" amount of Rs.50/- 
2. Sign Up platform, Coupon Redemption and Payment should be done on iPhone, Windows or Android App
3. Offer can be redeemed only once per user per card and is applicable for the "Add Money" payment done during the offer period on MobiKwik App
4. Offer will be valid only for the transactions done through Debit Card or Credit Card. Not valid on Net Banking and Virtual Cards
5. Offer valid for new MobiKwik user only
6. Valid till 31st Oct'15
By clicking on submit I agree to the terms & conditions mentioned at the link below
If you have open ride(s) invitations, they will appear here
Enter a brief but detailed description of the problem
*Thank you for reporting a problem!\nOur team will look into this issue and correct it as soon as possible.

string.name: underline_text_book_a_cab
string.u: Going alone, just find a cab
